short_summary: Level 3 Technical Architect with expertise in virtualization and cloud technologies to support the Exercise and Simulation branch
description: A Technical Architect is required to support the Exercise and Simulation branch of the Royal Canadian Air Force, supporting the design, development, operation, and sustainment of internal private cloud infrastructure.
full_summary:
### **Technical Architect, Level 3 (TBIPS)**

* **Contract Number** : W6431-240130
* **Tender Status** : Expiré (Expired)
* **Publication Date** : 16 Novembre 2023
* **Tender Closing Date** : 1 Decembre 2023, 14:00:00 HNE (Eastern Standard Time)
* **Expected Contract Start Date** : 11 Décembre 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date** : 31 Mars 2024

**Procurement Details**
• **Notice Type** : Demande de proposition découlant d’un arrangement en matière d’approvisionnement (RFP against Supply Arrangement)
• **Procurement Method** : Concurrentielle – Appel d'offres sélectif (Competitive - Selective tendering)
• **Selection Criteria** : Cote combinée la plus élevée pour le mérite technique et le prix (Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price)
• **Regions of Opportunity**
   - Ottawa
• **Regions of Delivery**
   - Région de la capitale nationale (RCN)
   - Canada
   - Ottawa

**Contracting Entity**
 Ministère de la Défense nationale
 Address : 51 Anson Ave, Bldg 518, Trenton, Ontario, K0K 3W0
 Contact Information :
 Leanne Cooper, (613) 392-2811 or leanne.cooper@forces.gc.ca

### **Tender Brief**
The Department of National Defence (DND) requires the professional services of one Level 3 Technical Architect with a focus on virtualization and cloud technologies to support the Exercise and Simulation (E&S) branch of the Royal Canadian Air Force (RCAF) Aerospace Warfare Centre (AWC) in Ottawa, ON.

### **Note**
All tenders must be submitted electronically via the Canadabuys website.

### **Tender Documents**
The tender documents are available for download from the Canadabuys website at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/25048/w6431-240130-tbips_npp-eng.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/25048/w6431-240130-tbips_npp-eng.pdf) (English), and [https://canadabu
